nodes.text: Pyre's blaster was the personal Sonn-Blas F-11D blaster rifle used by Commander Pyre. The blaster featured a butt stock, gold finish, and a re-curved trigger guard for a two-handed grip. In 34 ABY, Pyre carried his blaster on the Colossus platform on Castilon and used it during his search for Eila and Kel.
